lyrics:
26 contributorsnobody compares lyricsverse 1 niall zayn

now youre tearing me apart tearing me apart

to get you to want me like before

baby tell me how to make it right
now all of my friends say its not really worth it
but even if thats true
no one in the world could stop me from not moving on
baby even if i wanted to
nobody compares to you

now youre tearing up my heart tearing up my heart
